title: Karl-Heinz Lange and the East German typographic scene
content:
For those of You – like me – who saw Ole Schäfers presentation in Brighton this year on the typefaces of Karl-Heinz Lange (and for everyone who might be interested in VEB Typoart; The East German Type _Betriebsstätte_) here’s an article in [Pingmag](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010070358/http:/pingmag.jp/2007/10/05/veb-typoart-the-east-german-type-betriebsstatte/).

 [‹ Matching Sans & Serif faces for a magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010070358/http:/typophile.com/node/2173 "Go to previous forum topic") [fonts for Aleut linguistics ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010070358/http:/typophile.com/node/37486 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredo
